name: data-analyzer
description: Analyze JSON data arrays with operations like summary, average, count, filter, sort, and groupBy. Parses JSON input and performs statistical and structural analysis on datasets.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: data_analyzer
toolDefinition.description: Analyze a JSON data array with various operations including summary statistics, averaging numeric fields, counting records, filtering by field values, sorting, and grouping by field.

data.description: JSON string representing an array of objects to analyze

operation.description: The analysis operation to perform on the data

field.description: The field name to operate on (required for average, filter, sort, groupBy)

value.description: The value to filter by (required for filter operation)

order.description: Sort order (used with sort operation, default: asc)
